GeochemXYDiagram.name: Alkali Feldspar Control Diagram (Ti)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Na+K v sAl, No projection. Molar ratios used throughout the PER-GER ratio diagrams
"AF" alkali feldspar control line, "Mu" muscovite control line. Kalsilite will plot along "AF" line
Aluminosilicate and anorthite plot along Ox axis
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
